name: Swampy GoGo
description:
As a curious flower, you exit your purgatorial lobby and descend into an unfamiliar realm of luminescent lowlands..

 

Tap and slide your mouse/trackpad to navigate through the crispy undergrowth, cosmic floodplains and blooming atmospheres. Capture gifs using the button at the bottom of your screen. 

 

Photons shower as you plumb deep into uncharted mires awash with extra-terrestrial grasses and sedges. Thankfully, you are not alone on your endless journey - cosmic pearls hatch flowerlings in a wisp of pollen who join your adventure. As the sun sets, bask in the sounds of your new world. There are no limits imposed upon your exploration, the aim is to relinquish yourself in its hypnotizing realm.

 

Swampy GoGo is an Augmented Reality Experience which extends from two-dimensional mixed media landscapes made by Diana Lynn VanderMeulen. This app was made in collaboration with Spek Work. Soundscape by Ah! La lettre!
